title: Create GitHub repository and enable Issues
body:
Set up a new repository called `kgiq-portfolio` on GitHub.
Enable Issues and Discussions tabs.

title: Create GitHub Project Board (Kanban)
body:
Add a new GitHub Project (classic or beta).
Use columns: To Do, In Progress, Done.
Link it to your `kgiq-portfolio` repo.

title: Setup React project with Vite
body:
Initialize a new React app using Vite for fast dev experience.
Steps:
- Run `npm create vite@latest kgiq-portfolio --template react`
- Install dependencies
- Run dev server and verify setup

title: Add Bootstrap and SCSS integration
body:
Configure Bootstrap 5 and your custom SCSS theme for styling consistency.
Steps:
- Install Bootstrap
- Create `styles/main.scss`
- Import Bootstrap + SCSS into `main.jsx`

title: Set up basic folder structure
body:
Create `/components`, `/pages`, `/data`, and `/assets` folders to organize the app.
Ensure consistent structure for all project modules.

title: Configure React Router with initial routes
Build `<Navbar />` and `<Footer />` components
body:
Migrate your existing Bootstrap nav and footer to React components.
Ensure active link highlights and mobile nav toggle work properly.

title: Migrate Hero section to `<Hero />` component
body:
Rebuild the hero from your static resume as a reusable component in React.
Include image, name, tagline, and CTA buttons.

title: Deploy MVP to Hostinger via webhook
body:
Bundle the app (`npm run build`) and verify webhook-based deployment to Hostinger.
Confirm that navigation, styling, and Hero section render properly.
